## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.setParent\_() method

Attaches the SVG root of the marker to the SVG group of the parent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected setParent_(newParent: IASTNodeLocationSvg): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newParent | [IASTNodeLocationSvg](./blockly.iastnodelocationsvg_interface.md) | The workspace, field, or block that the marker SVG element should be attached to. |

void
